channel.title: Online, but can't log in? I need IMMEDIATE help!
channel.description:
Hey there, I have one, pretty simple question, it should be anyway lol.
I just made a server, it's: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: Now, I did everything your s'pose to do, but when i go to click on, runserver, i do it, and it says: -Allstar-Scape v1- .. Online !
that's what it says. So.. I go to: http://client.silabsoft.org/ and type in some random username and password, then type in: runescape-v3.servegame.com under, the "Server" thing. Then I click login. And it just keeps saying: "Error connecting to Server"
CAN SOMEONE PLEASE HELP ME TO TELL ME WHAT IM DOING WRONG SO I CAN FIX THIS AND GET ON MY SERVER?
[b][u]Whoever answers this questions and solves it, get's to be Admin on my Server![/u][/b]
Thank you

item.title: Online, but can't log in? I need IMMEDIATE help!
item.dc:creator: @abctest123abc abctest123abc
item.description:
@abctest123abc wrote:

Ancient, u need to get wireless internet connection
Than u can go on your router i think

Read full topic

item.source: Online, but can't log in? I need IMMEDIATE help!

item.title: Online, but can't log in? I need IMMEDIATE help!
item.dc:creator: @Digital_Hotdogs Digital Hotdogs
item.description:
@Digital_Hotdogs wrote:

[quote=“shockys, post:14, topic:256905”]actuall…you cann.
to log into your sever, for only YOU to be able to log in,
you dont need anything, expect the source, you run it, and for the ip you type in; 0.0.0.0
only yourself will be able to log in, and nobody else.
for it to be on-line, you need no-ip.[/quote]
For your own NO-IP I said. You can connect using localhost/0.0.0.0/ /Computers-name. Which if you rename to the no-ip is the only way you can connect using it.

Read full topic

to log into your sever, for only YOU to be able to log in,

for it to be on-line, you need no-ip.

item.title: Online, but can't log in? I need IMMEDIATE help!
item.dc:creator: @Digital_Hotdogs Digital Hotdogs
item.description:
@Digital_Hotdogs wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:9, topic:256905”]if you have done no-ip and portfoward right then you should be able to log on with your real ip. check through it.

for now just use 0.0.0.0 while u have put ur server on.[/quote]Can’t logon your own server with a no-ip unless you change your computer name to the no-ip.

Read full topic

item.title: Online, but can't log in? I need IMMEDIATE help!
item.dc:creator: @fallen_angel666 fallen_angel666
item.description:
@fallen_angel666 wrote:

yup, like he said remove your server IP from the thread, it is concidered advertising. and also, leave your IP blank, you are concidered as LocalHost, therefore you do not need an IP… depending on your experience, you should know that and IP allows people to connect to your computer, so you dont need to connect to your own computer its simple common sense.

Read full topic
